data.title: Learn to Play Underwater Hockey (8392)
data.meta_description:
This activity is suitable for ages 8+
Learn to play the best sport you've never heard of!!
data.text:
Learn to play the best sport you've never heard of!!

Starting at one end of the 25m x 15m court you will work as a team to move the 1.2kg puck along the bottom of the pool and into the goal tray at the opposite end. All equipment is provided or you can bring your own mask, fins and snorkel.

Note: Participants under 18 years can attend but must be accompanied by an adult. Wear suitable clothing for swimming.

The delivery mode, conditions or rules for this activity may have been modified in accordance with State Government regulations for COVID-19.

By making a booking, or choosing to participate, in a City of Moreton Bay Recreation Program activity, you acknowledge and agree to the Program participant terms and conditions.

Subject to the participantsâ€™ consent, Council may take photographs / videos at this event for promotional purposes. If this event is selected for photography / videography, Council (or the event manager) will notify you and provide you with a Consent Form to complete and return to Council (or the event manager) either before or at the event. There will also be hard copy Consent Forms available to complete at the event, if needed. If you wish to participate in the event but do not consent to having your photograph / video taken, please advise the Council officer/s at the event or contact Council on healthyactive@moretonbay.qld.gov.au.
